import React, { useState } from "react"; import QuestionType from "./QuestionType"; import Question from "./Question"; import Options from "./Options"; import QuestionTiles from "./QuestionTiles"; import CandidateDetail from "./CandidateDetail"; import QuestionNav from "./QuestionNav"; const AttendExam = () => { const [questions, setQuestions] = useState([ { sequenceNum: 1, questiomId: 101, questionDetails: "what is java1?", optionA: "A", optionB: "B", optionC: "C", optionD: "D", optionE: "E", QuestionType: "Single Choice", }, { sequenceNum: 2, questiomId: 102, questionDetails: "what is java2?", optionA: "A", optionB: "B", optionC: "C", optionD: "D", optionE: "E", QuestionType: "Single Choice", }, { sequenceNum: 3, questiomId: 103, questionDetails: "what is java3?", optionA: "A", optionB: "B", optionC: "C", optionD: "D", optionE: "E", QuestionType: "True Or False", }, { sequenceNum: 4, questiomId: 104, questionDetails: "what is java4?", optionA: "A", optionB: "B", optionC: "C", optionD: "D", optionE: "E", QuestionType: "True Or False", }, { sequenceNum: 5, questiomId: 105, questionDetails: "what is java5?", optionA: "A", optionB: "B", optionC: "C", optionD: "D", optionE: "E", QuestionType: "True Or False", }, { sequenceNum: 6, questiomId: 106, questionDetails: "what is java6?", optionA: "A", optionB: "B", optionC: "C", optionD: "D", optionE: "E", QuestionType: "True Or False", }, { sequenceNum: 7, questiomId: 107, questionDetails: "what is java7?", optionA: "A", optionB: "B", optionC: "C", optionD: "D", optionE: "E", QuestionType: "True Or False", }, { sequenceNum: 8, questiomId: 108, questionDetails: "what is java8?", optionA: "A", optionB: "B", optionC: "C", optionD: "D", optionE: "E", QuestionType: "True Or False", }, { sequenceNum: 9, questiomId: 109, questionDetails: "what is java9?", optionA: "A", optionB: "B", optionC: "C", optionD: "D", optionE: "E", QuestionType: "True Or False", }, { sequenceNum: 10, questiomId: 110, questionDetails: "what is java10?", optionA: "A", optionB: "B", optionC: "C", optionD: "D", optionE: "E", QuestionType: "True Or False", }, ]); // const questions = [{ q: "What is JAVA ?" }, { q: "Why do we need JAVA" }]; const [activeQuestion, setActiveQuestion] = useState([]); const [activeQuestionType, setActiveQuestionType] = useState( `${questions[0].qt}` ); const [activeQuestionId, setActiveQuestionId] = useState(1); function onChange(sequenceNum) { // setActiveQuestionId(id + 1); // setActiveQuestion(questions[id].q); // setActiveQuestionType(questions[id].qt); const question = questions.filter( (question) => question.sequenceNum === sequenceNum ); console.log(question); setActiveQuestion([...question]); } // useEffect(()=>{ // const fetchTopic = fetch(`https://localhost:8443/onlineexam/control/`) // },[]) return (
